string-array.name: card_defect_desc
string-array.item: Deal 6 damage. Add a copy of this card to your discard pile
Gain 5 Block. Upgrade a card in your hand for the rest of combat
Block no longer expires at the start of your turn
Draw 3 cards. You cannot draw additional cards this turn
Gain 3 Vulnerable. Gain 1 Energy at the start of your turn.
Cost 1 less energy for each time you lose HP in combat. Deal 18 damage.
Deal damage equal to your current Block
At the start of your turn, lose 1 HP and draw 1 card.
Can only be played if every card in your hand is an Attack. Deal 14 damage.

string-array.name: card_defect_desc_upgrade
string-array.item: Deal 8 damage. Add a copy of this card to your discard pile
Gain 5 Block. Upgrade all cards in your hand for the rest of combat
Block no longer expires at the start of your turn
Draw 4 cards. You cannot draw additional cards this turn
Gain 2 Vulnerable. Gain 1 Energy at the start of your turn.
Cost 1 less energy for each time you lose HP in combat. Deal 22 damage.
Deal damage equal to your current Block
Innate. At the start of your turn, lose 1 HP and draw 1 card.
Can only be played if every card in your hand is an Attack. Deal 14 damage.
